source_systems.name: Reactome
source_systems.description: Open-source, peer-reviewed pathway database providing curated biological pathways and reactions in human biology and other species.

source_systems.name: UniProt
source_systems.description: Universal Protein Resource, a comprehensive protein sequence and functional information database.

source_systems.name: KEGG
source_systems.description: Kyoto Encyclopedia of Genes and Genomes, a database resource for understanding high-level functions and utilities of the biological system.

source_systems.name: MONDO
source_systems.description: Monarch Disease Ontology (MONDO) integrates multiple disease resources (OMIM, Orphanet, ICD, DOID, etc.) into a unified ontology.
